name: openshift_app_mjt
description: A sample Node/React project for testing with OpenShift

scripts.build: rimraf dist/ && npm run --prefix ../client build && mkdirp dist/client && cp -r ../client/build dist/client && babel ./src --out-dir dist/ --ignore ./node_modules,./.babelrc,./package.json,./npm-debug.log --copy-files && rimraf ../client/build
scripts.start: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node dist/index.js
scripts.server: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon src/index.js --exec babel-node --presets babel-preset-env

author: Matt Tischler (mjtischler@gmail.com)
